MemoryInfobox.description: 'After workers in a Vineyard, Lesbos|vineyard on Lesbos fell ill, Kassandra was hired to find the local Doctor|physician's tools and medicine.'

General_Description: '''Qamra, Medicine Woman''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a physician who requested her to find his tools and medicine.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra reached a [[Vineyard, Lesbos|Vineyard]] on the island of [[Lesbos]], and overheard a farmer lamenting an ill turn of events, and a [[Doctor|healer]], [[Qamra]], trying to assuage him. *'''Farmer:''' ''What are we going to do...'' *'''Nurse:''' ''Don't worry, its curable.'' Kassandra approached them. *'''Kassandra:''' ''What's wrong?'' *'''Farmer:''' ''My workers are sick! At this rate, I won't be able to feed my own family, never mind theirs.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''The good news is this isn't the work of the gods, but a sickness of the body—the throat in particular. I could treat the workers... if I had my medical supplies.'' She turned to Kassandra. *'''Nurse:''' [[Mercenary|Misthios]]''... Would you get them for me?'' |-|My services aren't cheap.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''If you'll pay my fee... The health of your workers depends on it.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''I'd have hoped the wellbeing of these people would be payment enough.'' *'''Farmer:''' ''Yes, yes. Of course I'll reward you. Will you do it?'' |-|I'm happy to help.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I wouldn't want them to suffer.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''Well said. Such goodwill deserves a reward, doesn't it?'' *'''Farmer:''' ''Hmm... ? Oh! Of course. Of course. I have something worthwhile to trade for the service. Will you do it?'' :(Already found supplies and tools) :*'''Kassandra:''' ''I think I might just have what you're looking for.'' :*'''Nurse:''' ''There's no way you could have—'' :*'''Kassandra:''' ''See for yourself.'' :(Dialogue continues at "Thank you. These are specialized items...") (Accept – "I'll get the supplies.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll find your supplies.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''Excellent. My tools are in [[Ancient Pearl]], and the [[Medicine|drugs]] are in [[Lover's Bay]].'' (If players choose "Where in Ancient Pearl are your tools?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Ancient Pearl is pretty big. Where exactly did you leave your tools?'' *'''Nurse:''' ''In the clinic at [[Vrisa Fort]].'' (If players choose "Where in Lover's Bay is the medicine?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Where exactly in Lover's Bay should I look?'' *'''Farmer:''' ''At the [[Leader House, Petrified Islands|Leader House]] in [[Mytilene]], northeast of the [[Artemis Temple|temple]].'' (Leave – "I'll go now.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back with your supplies.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''The faster you do, the sooner I can help the workers.'' Kassandra took her leave of the two. On her way off the vineyard grounds, she decided to take care of this immediately. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll go get the tools and drugs.'' Kassandra made her way south to Vrisa Fort. [[Ikaros]] surveyed the courtyards and found the clinic. *'''Kassandra:''' ''That must be Vrisa Fort.'' Kassandra infiltrated the fort and obtained the tools.
(Medical Tools obtained first) *'''Kassandra:''' ''The drugs are in the Leader House.'' (Medical Tools obtained second) *'''Kassandra:''' ''The physician's tools.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I have what the physician asked for. I should take it back to the vineyard.'' Kassandra made her way to the Leader House. Ikaros identified it at a glance. *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Leader House.'' Kassandra infiltrated the Leader House and swiped the medicine from his bedchamber.
(Medicine obtained first) *'''Kassandra:''' ''She said the medical tools are in Vrisa Fort...'' (Medicine obtained second) *'''Kassandra:''' ''These must be the drugs the physician wanted.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I have what the physician asked for. I should take it back to the vineyard.'' With both items obtained, Kassandra returned to the Vineyard and handed the items to Qamra. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I found your supplies.'' *'''Nurse:''' ''Thank you. These are specialized items—I couldn't have replaced them in time.'' *'''Farmer:''' ''My [[grape]]s are saved!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I get the feeling that's all you've cared about from the start.'' *'''Farmer:''' ''Without grapes, there's no work. By healing the workers, you've saved my farm! Take this.'' Kassandra was given a [[Medicinal Sash|sash]] as a reward.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered the tools and supplies the nurse needed to heal the vineyard workers.
Section_Trivia: *The name of the memory is a homage to the American series ''{{Wiki|Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman}}''.
